description: APPLICATION FOR ADVERTISEMENT CONSENT FOR THE DISPLAY OF A FREESTANDING FORUM STRUCTURE, FEATURING DIGITAL 86" DOUBLE SIDED SCREEN. THE DIGITAL SCREEN IS CAPABLE OF DISPLAYING ILLUMINATED, MOVING IMAGES AND CONTENT IS SUPPLIED VIA SECURE REMOTE CONNECTION.
site_name: Advertisement Hoarding Near Junction With Western Road
decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - This consent shall expire 5 years from the date of this decision.
Condition : 2 - The development hereby permitted shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans: Location plan OS MAP scale 1 : 1200, Merton's digital 86' panel dimensions plan

Condition : 3 - Any advertisement displayed, and any site used for the display of advertisements shall be maintained in a condition that does not impair the visual amenity of the site.
REASON: To safeguard the appearance of the locality and highway and pedestrian safety.

Condition : 4 - The proposed advertisements should operate at an illumination level no greater than 600cd/m2 between dusk and dawn, consistent with the guidance set out in the Institute of Lighting Professionals (ILP) publication: "The Brightness of Illuminated Advertisements" (PLG05, January 2015).
REASON: To safeguard the appearance of the locality and highway and pedestrian safety.

Condition : 5 - The rate of change should be limited to once every five seconds, and moving images, animation, video or full motion images should not be displayed due to the advertisement being viewable to drivers in moving traffic, as consistent with the guidance set out in the ILP (PLG05, January 2015).
REASON: To safeguard the appearance of the locality and highway and pedestrian safety.

Condition : 6 - The proposed advertisements must not have any intermittent light source, moving feature, animation or exposed cold cathode tubing.
REASON: To safeguard the appearance of the locality and highway and pedestrian safety.

Condition : 7 - INFORMATIVE: The footway and carriageway on the A236 Western Road should not be blocked during the installation of the advertisements. Temporary obstructions during the installation works should be kept to a minimum and should not encroach on the clear space needed to provide safe passage for pedestrians or obstruct the flow of traffic on the A236 Western Road. All vehicles should only park/ stop at permitted locations and within the time periods permitted by existing on-street restrictions.

Condition : 8 - INFORMATIVE:  The applicant is informed that no advertisement should be displayed without the permission of the owner of the site or any other person with an interest in the site entitled to grant permission.

Condition : 9 - INFORMATIVE: Where an Advertisement is required under these Regulations to be removed, the site shall be made good and left in a condition that does not endanger the public or impair visual amenity.
